decks.notes: This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on generating early mana advantage with Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic, enabling quick plays with cards like Pillage the Bog and Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and The Huntsman's Redemption to control the board. Strong finishers like Archfiend of the Dross and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse provide late-game threats, while cards like Vein Ripper and Preacher of the Schism offer versatility in dealing with opponent strategies. The deck's mana base includes various utility lands to support aggressive plays and ensure consistency in casting spells.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on playing creatures with haste and pump spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The key strategy is to maintain aggressive board presence while using spells like Monstrous Rage and Blossoming Defense to protect creatures and maximize damage output. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an extra element of consistency to the deck. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, efficient creatures and burn spells in order to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.
